name: Loot of the Warp
description: The Immaterium grants you fleshly vigor and fills your grasp with plunder.

name: Mind for Gold
description: Visions whispered by Tzeentch guide your steps to hidden spoils.

name: Flesh for the Fight
description: Khorne’s blessing swells your vitality for the slaughter ahead.

name: Blood for Booty
description: Through bloodshed you claim both victory and the spoils of war.

name: Mad Strength
description: Madness gnaws at your mind, yet your blows strike with greater fury.

name: Warp‑Forged Armor
description: Demon‑forged plate hardens your guard, at the cost of mortal resilience.

name: Vital Spoils
description: The spoils of conquest restore your strength and spirit.

name: Mindstrike
description: A psychic surge crushes the will of your enemies in battle.

name: Blood and Iron
description: Bloodlust fuels your body, though your armour suffers for it.

name: Crippling Chant
description: The chorus of Chaos saps your strength and clouds your mind.

name: Shield of Doubt
description: Demonic whispers weaken your mind but fortify your guard.

name: Blade of Resolve
description: Your resolve falters, yet your blade hungers for blood.

name: Rotting Plate
description: Nurgle’s blessing swells your flesh as your armour decays.

name: Psychic Plunder
description: Your mind’s reach draws both knowledge and treasure from the foe.

name: Pulse of Carnage
description: The rhythm of slaughter feeds your lifeblood.

name: Plagueborn Guard
description: Pestilent endurance fills you, though your armour is shed.

name: Whisper of Decay
description: A faint murmur from Nurgle grants you a sliver of vitality.

name: Token of Suffering
description: A drop of blood offered to the Dark Gods, with no further change.

name: Gift of Vitality
description: The Dark Gods flood your form with life and sharpen your strike.

name: Undivided’s Endurance
description: The favour of all four gods steels your body but clouds your mind.
